message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better than waiting and getting less.
I understand you want a larger share, but waiting will only hurt us both. Let's be reasonable: 70/30 split, take it or leave it.
Bob, this is already getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit with the inflation, you're getting a better deal each round. Meet me in the middle: 55/45
